name: radon_mn
title: The Radon contamination dataset of Gelman and Hill (2006), Minnesota subset
description:
A data set containing data of radon levels in eighty-five different counties in the USA. 

 - N: number of observations
  - J: number of counties  
  - floor_measure: floor measurements 
  - log_radon: log-radon measurements
  - log_uppm: county uranium reading
  - county: county id

Note that the county index is different compared to the radon_all data.
